messages.subject: Respectful talking *does* work, was re: how to make
messages.msgSnippet: PLEASE forgive me for bringing this up again. But I just HAVE to say it. Yoki (hi Yoki) has come to this list saying that she schools at home. No one has
messages.messageBody:
PLEASE forgive me for bringing this up again. But I just HAVE to say it. Yoki
(hi Yoki) has come to this list saying that she schools at home. No one has
jumped on her, told her to just do it, been short or impatient with her, etc.
Everyone has talked and explained to her, right to the point but very
respectfully, the ways of unschooling. She hasn't had to feel like she's
needed to be defensive, and therefore (IMO), she's been receiving and
understanding the info. She's only been here a few day's, and yet, even
though she's been talked to *nicely*, she's still getting it, and fast. Just
an observation, I'm NOT starting anything. Lara..........
